abstract.t: A fast reroute framework for egress node protection is specified by [RFC8679] . But it cannot be applied to EVPN directly. This document specifies a mechanism to apply Egress Node Protection to EVPN nodes and apply Egress Link Protection to EVPN EAD/EVI routes, especially for the convergency of BUM packets and the unified signallings for the MPLS SPEs and TPEs.
